dct_description_sm: the illustrations by H. Warren ; engraved by J.B. Allen ; the map drawn & engraved by J. Rapkin.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "Miles".
3 pictorial vignettes: The castles of Europe and Asia -- Jerusalem -- [Ostrich].
Shows topography, drainage, boundaries, places of historical interest.
